908877403178586114.text: This budget is one more win for Wisconsin under GOP leadership that has ensured our state is moving forward. We won't stop here. #WIWorking

908876632873717760.text: We set aside $200 million in reserve funding to ensure that our state has the resources to respond to any future challenges we may face.

908875827584147456.text: We took steps towards a long term transportation funding solution and held transportation bonding to the lowest level in over a decade.

908875622671425541.text: We worked to hold down the cost of higher education with an extension of the UW tuition freeze.

908875253077684224.text: We put even more back into the pockets of taxpayers with a phase out of the personal property tax and a repeal of prevailing wage.

908875008730177536.text: We refused to raise income or property taxes and completely eliminated two taxes from state statute for good.

908874851703803904.text: We made historic investments in K12 education, with increases of over $200 per pupil each year totaling over $630 million.
